column1: fuller on the stumps, a hint of swing away, pushed towards mid-off for a quick single
length ball around off, comes forward and taps it towards extra cover
length around off, tapped towards covers from the front foot
length again, a touch straighter this time, defended towards mid-on this time
a touch fuller this time, Fernando pushes at it half-heatedly, ends up chipping down the ground but well away and to the right of mid-off, dribbles towards the boundary
length ball from Amir, just around the off stump, comes forward and taps it towards mid-off
length ball but angling on to the pads, flicked away to beat the fine leg fielder for four
corrects his line this time. Length ball around off, defended down the wicket
fuller around off, flicked again but short midwicket comes in the picture
length ball in the corridor, comes forward and leaves it alone
length ball, some room outside off, Gunathilaka stands tall and punches it through covers for the second four of the over
fuller around off, comes forward and pushes it towards extra cover with the full face of the bat, cannot find the gap though

and there's an edge. A length ball around off, Fernando was playing on the walk, pushing at it without reaching to the pitch. The ball angles across him and a regulation catch for Sarfaraz behind the stumps

fuller on the leg stump, pushed to the left of mid-on, Wahab chases it all the way before putting in a slide but think his foot was touching the boundary line as he pushed the ball in. A bit sloppy from the fast bowler, I will have to say
length ball on the stumps, gets behind it and defends with the full face of the bat
length ball around off, some extra bounce there as well. Thirimanne was pushing at it, gets an inside edge on to the pad
a touch fuller around off, defend towards short midwicket from the crease
length ball around fourth stump, a big stride forward and a solid block
length ball around off, punched off the back foot towards extra cover
fuller around off, driven firmly down the ground but Shinwari fields it in his follow through
fuller around off, drives from the front foot but gets a thick outside edge towards point, Shadab dives full length to his right to make the stop. One of the best fielders around in that region
beaten! Fuller outside off, inviting the drive once again. Gunathilaka was walking into the shot, was playing down the wrong line too and fails to make any contact
Shadab again. Fuller and driven in the point direction but Shadab is excellent once again, another dive to his right to make the partial stop and that's enough to prevent any runs
and that's a maiden. A length ball around off, Gunathilaka comes forward and taps it towards covers
a slower one from Amir, fuller around off, Thirimanne defends it from the front foot
length ball on the pads, tucked away towards fine leg
short outside off but not that quick and Gunathilaka swivels to pull it in front of the square leg, rolling his hands over it to keep it down
length ball outside off, tapped towards point but a fumble from Shadab this time allows the batsman a single
length ball around off and middle, defended from the back foot
length ball around off, stays in his crease and taps it towards covers
fuller around off, Gunathilaka puts a stride forward and drives it imperiously through extra cover, lovely timing and balance on that
length ball around off, taps it towards covers from the front foot
Shinwari goes short this time but Gunathilaka is once again up to it, pulls it down towards deep square leg, only a single this time though
length ball around off, defends it on the off side from the crease
length ball around off, opens the face of the bat this time to work it towards point
a scorching drive through covers. Fuller around off once again and Thirimanne gets into the act this time, leaning into the shot to end the over in the same manner it started
length ball but down the leg side, needs to be bowled again
length ball on the pads tucked away in front of square leg
short of length on the off stump, goes back on his toes and drops it at his feet with soft hands
length ball around off, defends it from the crease
fuller on the stumps, pushes it towards mid-on this time
length ball around off, steers it towards third man by opening the face of the bat
fuller around off, comes forward and pushes it tentatively towards mid-off
fuller around off, defended from the front foot
flatter and fuller on the pads this time, pushed towards short midwicket
length ball around off, comes forward and defends right under his eyes
length ball around off, pushes towards covers from the front foot
short of length around off, punched towards mid-on from the back foot
and he starts with a maiden. Short of length outside off, goes for the cut but gets a thick outside edge, Amir makes a stop to his right at short third man
length ball around off, pushed towards cover-point
fuller on the stumps and flicked past mid-on, great timing on that. Once it beat the fielder, there was no chance of stopping it
length ball around off, comes forward and defends it towards extra cover
length ball around off, gets behind the line and blocks
length ball around off, steers it towards the right of the point fielder, Shadab once again dives to his right to make the stop
short of length outside off, some room as well, Thirimanne stands tall and punches it through the covers for the second four of the over
length ball around off, punched to the left of the extra cover fielder
short outside off, gets it through this time, cuts it between point and short third man to find the boundary
length ball but drifting down the leg side, a wide
length ball around off, defended from the crease
length ball outside off, punched firmly but straight towards cover
length ball angling on to the pads, helped behind square leg
length ball outside off, comes forward and defends it with hard hands
length ball outside off, looks to push it towards point, gets a thick outside edge towards third man
length ball on the pads, tucked away towards backward square leg, they thought of the second first but settled for one in the end
length ball on the pads, looks to flick but misses and gets hit on the pads
straying on the pads once again, flicked through the midwicket region, the deep square leg fielder comes across to keep it to two
a bouncer this time, just outside off, Thirimanne ducks under without any difficulty
fuller on the stumps, drives it firmly but straight to mid-on
fuller on the stumps, pushes it towards extra cover from the front foot
length outside off, goes back and cuts it towards sweeper cover
use of feet this time to reach to the pitch of this and drives it towards long-off, all along the ground
fuller around off, Gunathilaka was stuck on the back foot, pushes it towards cover
length ball around off, stays in his crease and defends
length ball on the pads, pushes it towards long-on for a walking single
length ball around off, defends it from the back foot
fuller on the stumps, pushes it down the ground, mid-on comes across to make the stop, Gunathilaka was interested in the single but Thirimanne sends him back
Wahab goes for the short ball once again, pulled towards deep square leg, once again keeping it down
length ball around off, stays beside the line of the ball and taps it towards cover-point

short of length outside off, steers it behind a diving point fielder, Shinwari chases it from third man, slides to make the stop but just like Wahab earlier in the day, his foot was touching the boundary rope
length ball around off, punched from the crease but straight towards extra cover
fuller around off, driven towards long-off
length ball on the pads, tucked away towards square leg to bring up the 50-run stand
length outside off, cuts it towards sweeper cover, Sarfaraz isn't happy
fuller on the stumps, drives it towards long-on
length ball on the stumps, taps it towards covers and looks for a quick single, Thirimanne sends him back
length ball around off, punched towards long-off for one
fuller on the pads, flicked away but straight towards short midwicket
fuller but down the leg side, the umpire stretches his arms
length ball around off, flicked away but once again finds short midwicket
fuller around off and spinning in, Gunathilaka was stuck on the back foot, manages to get his bat down in time, flicked towards short fine leg
fuller around off, Gunathilaka goes for the reverse sweep, a top edge but manages to get it over short third man
length ball on the pads, tucked away towards backward square leg
fuller on the pads, flicks it in front of square leg this time, comes back for the second
fuller around off, drives it towards mid-off from the front foot
short of length outside off, punches it towards sweeper cover for another single
length ball, angling in towards the batsman who goes back and taps it towards cover
length again, pushed towards extra cover from the crease
fuller on the stumps, tucked away towards square leg, Sarfaraz fields himself
length ball outside off, goes for the cut but cannot beat the point fielder
fuller around off, comes forward and drags it towards long-on
fuller outside off, drives it towards sweeper cover, Sarfaraz is not happy with his bowler
tossed up a bit, Gunathilaka goes down and takes it on the full, paddles it towards fine leg
fuller around off, stays in the crease and defends
length ball around off, spinning in, punches it towards cover
length ball outside off, looked like a googly, Thirimanne goes for the punch but misses
length ball, outside off, and defended off the back foot to cover
full, on middle, and mistimed back to the bowler
cut behind square between point and backward point. Rocks back and places this perfectly for four
full, on off. And he takes a big stride forward to block with soft hands
full on middle. Tries to flick it square but it hits his pads instead. Soft appeal for lbw turned down
length ball, outside off, and he cuts to deep point
pushed to cover, but can't find the gap
tossed up on middle, and he taps this with the bat's open face past backward point. Misfield in the deep allows them to come for the second
full, on leg stump. Flicked to deep midwicket
full, just outside off, and pushes to cover for a single

length ball, outside leg stump. Flicked with the turn towards midwicket. Fielder has a shy at the stumps, but he misses. Overthrows means its four more for Sri Lanka. Wayward through from the fielder at square leg
full, on leg stump. Tries to flick leg-side but finds the fielder at square leg
full, just outside off. And guided to cover
full, just outside off. Drilled to long on for a walking single
full, on leg stump, and flicked to deep midwicket
full, on off, and guided to point off the front foot
well taken! Full, just outside off, and he strikes this straight back to the bowler. Taken near his chest. Big breakthrough
full, on off, and flicked towards cover off the back foot
full, on off, and driven to long on
full, on leg stump. Flicked to the leg side
full, on middle. Front-foot defense to meet the ball
full, on off. Whipped to short midwicket
full, on middle, and smacked straight to the non-striker's stumps
full, on middle. Worked off his pads to the leg side
full, just outside off. He goes across the line and drives to long on
full, just outside off stump. Defended towards backward point
full on middle stump. Defended towards cover
reverse swept over short third man! Enough on the shot to beat the infield
full, on off stump. Drilled to long on
full, outside off, and driven down the ground to long off
full, on off stump. Mistimes the googly to mid-on for a quick single
full, outside leg stump. Flicked to deep midwicket
full, just outside off stump. Driven to wide long off
full, on leg stump, and he hammers a drive towards mid-on. They scamper across before the fielder can get to it
half-tracker outside off, and he pulls to deep midwicket
full, outside off, and he tries to sweep
short and wide. He rocks back and cuts it behind square past the infield
length ball, on middle. Flicked to the leg side
full, on middle. Meets the ball under his eye and fends it away
full, on leg stump. Tapped to midwicket
length ball, on middle. Tapped to short third man
tossed up, on off. Driven to the bowler's left
full, outside off, and driven to to wide long off
full, on middle, and he tries to go for a reverse sweep. Misses
length ball, on off. Tapped towards the off side
good length, just outside off. Tapped off the back foot to cover
length ball, on leg stump. Flicked to deep midwicket
full on leg stump. Makes room and drives down to long on
full, on middle Makes room and absolutely clatters it over the bowler's head
length ball on leg stump. Guided to short fine leg
full, on middle. Fended away to the leg side
full, on off stump. Driven to deep extra cover
length ball, outside off, and guided off the back foot to point
length ball on leg stump. Flicked off his hips to deep midwicket
full, on middle. Flicked off his toes to deep midwicket
length ball, wide outside off, and cut in front of square to deep point
full, on off, and defended off the back foot to cover
full, on off, and he lofts this over the leg side for a huge six. Clears his front leg and places it over wide long on
length ball, outside off. Opens the bat's face to short third man
length ball, on off. Punched off the back foot
length ball, outside off, and punched off the back foot to cover
length ball, outside off, and he opens the bat's face to guide it down to deep point
full, on middle. Whipped off his pads to deep midwicket
full on off stump. Driven to long off
full, on middle, and flicked off his toes to deep midwicket
back of a length on off, and he sways away from the ball's line
full, just outside off, and he leans into a glorious looking drive through the covers!
opens the bat's face and runs it down to third man
full, on middle, and the attempted drive is spliced to cover
yorker on off, but he does well to splice this away to short third man. Fifty stand
full, on off stump. Flicked off his toes but it's in the air, and pocketed by the fielder placed at midwicket. Shinwari carrying his form from the other day
full, outside off, and driven to mid-off. He's toe ended this shot though
full, just outside off stump. Tapped with soft hands as they sneak across for a single
full, on off stump. Defended towards mid off as they scamper through for a single
length ball outside off, but this is the slower one from Usman. Tries to defend off the back foot, but the ball goes past his edge to the keeper
length ball outside off, and punched away to cover
length ball, outside off. The attempted cut is too close to his body, and is spliced to mid-on
length ball, just outside off stump. Tries to run it fine but deceived by the slower ball. Through to the keeper in the bounce. The ball was very close to the edge
length ball, outside off, and cut behind square to deep point
good length outside off stump. Opens the bat's face and chops it down to third man
length ball, outside off, and punched off the back foot
good length, just outside off stump. Fended away to cover off the back foot
good length, outside off stump. Opens the bat's face late to guide a shot to point
full, on middle stump. Drilled past the bowler's left for a quick single as mid-on gets behind it
length ball, on off stump and angling in. Defended off the back foot towards the non-striker
length ball, just outside off, and he tries to flick towards the leg side. But the ball stays low and sneaks under his bat
full, outside off stump. Pushed off the back foot past the fielder at point
there's the hundred! At a run-a-ball. Full, just outside off stump, and driven square to deep point. Removes his helmet and celebrates with his bat in the air. Dugout on their feet too
full, just outside off. Brings his bat down for a drive, but slices the shot down to deep point
full, on off stump. Tapped to short cover, but can't beat the fielder
full, on off stump. Pushed with the bat's full face to long off
full, on off stump, and he cross-bats a whip to deep midwicket
sight for sore eyes! Full, on middle, and he offers the bat's full face to drive a shot over the non-striker. One bounce past long on for a four
length ball, just outside off. Beaten by the pace as he looks to cut. Through to the keeper
fuller around off, comes forward and defends
fell short of the bowler. Length ball around off, looks to force it from the back foot, almost ends up chipping it back to Iftikhar
fuller around off, uses his feet to drive it down the ground
length ball on the pads, tucked away behind square leg
fuller down the leg side once again, sweeps it behind square leg, Fakhar Zaman puts in a chase from deep square leg and in a valiant effort to pull it just inside
length ball outside off, works it square off the wicket for one
length ball around off, a change of pace. Gunathilaka waits for it before opening the bat, straight to the point though
another slower one. Gunathilaka was skipping down the track, had to re-adjust and dab it on the off side
fuller around off, chips down and drives it towards mid-off
a slower bouncer, goes for the pull but misses, called a wide for height. A close call. Amir is not happy
another slower one. A length ball at the stumps this time. Defended from the crease
fuller on the stumps, skips down and converts it into a yorker, digs it out towards covers
skips down the track to this full toss and hits it towards mid-off, a misfield by Nawaz there and Sri Lanka end the over with a boundary
uses his feet to this fuller ball and drives it towards deep extra cover
length ball around off, comes down the track and nudges it towards cover
length ball on the stumps, goes back and pulls it towards long-on
short of length around off, Bhanuka goes for the pull, just clears the short midwicket
fuller around off, comes forward and drives it back towards the bowler
length ball on the stumps, flicked towards short midwicket
length ball around off, dabs it towards point for a quick single
fuller on the pads, goes for the flick but misses, gets a leg bye to short fine leg
a slower one, fuller outside off, guided towards third man by opening the face of the bat
a short one just outside off, at 143kph, Bhanuka was looking to pull but bails at the last moment
another bouncer, at 141kph, but outside off, Bhanuka lets it sail over
length ball on the pads, tucked away towards square leg
fuller on the off stump, turns it towards short midwicket
uses his feet this time but gets a thick outside edge towards covers, comes back for the second
fuller on the stumps, driven towards long-on
length ball on the stumps, goes for the reverse sweep, not from the middle of the bat but enough to take it over short third man
short of length outside off, cuts it towards point for one
length ball outside off, pushes at it but gets beaten
short of length outside off, punched towards covers from the back foot
fuller outside off, gives himself some room and squeezes it out behind point, beats the man in the deep for a much-needed boundary
moves across his stumps this time and looks to scoop it over short fine leg, misses and gets hit on the right shoe, sneaks in a leg bye though
fuller on the stumps, drives it towards left of mid-on who puts in a slide to make the stop
short of length, skips down the track and looks to smash it on the off side, misses
a slower one, fuller outside off, looks to smash it through extra cover but finds the fielder, hobbles to the other end
length ball, Gunathilaka was moving towards the leg side, Shinwari follows him, the batsman works it towards covers
a bouncer this time, Bhanuka was coming down the track, is cramped as he is looks to go for the pull, the ball hits his shoulder and lobs over the keeper for four
backs away once again to this short of a length ball, steered towards point as the bowler follows him
dispatched over deep square leg. Short of length around off, Bhanuka transfers his weight back and pulls it way over the boundary line
slower length ball down the leg side, called a wide
fuller around off, stays back and turns it towards the left of short midwicket

Sarfaraz has appealed for obstruction the field. Length ball angling in, Gunathilaka was moving towards the leg side, drops it at his feet and looks for the single, Shinwari charges in towards the ball and there is a bit of a collision as he tries to reach for the ball. Sarfaraz is not happy and has appealed. The soft signal is not out. Replays confirm Gunathilaka had no idea where the ball was and was simply going for the run when he found Shinwari in his way. Not out, says third umpire
length ball outside off, skips down and cuts it towards sweeper cover, Bhanuka slipped while returning for the second but makes it easily in the end, also the throw was at the bowler's end
charges down once again, more closer to the pitch of the ball this time and lofts it inside-out over wide long-off
length ball on the pads, tucked away behind square leg
length ball on the pads once more, pushed towards short midwicket
fuller on the stumps, flicked towards short fine leg, no run this time

fuller on the pads, a bit of miscommunication in the middle, Bhanuka wanted a single, Gunathilaka takes a couple of steps before saying no but Bhanuka is already halfway down and just gives up. The throw was a bit weak and wayward but Sarfaraz does well to collect and breaks the stumps
length ball on the stumps, goes for the reverse sweep, an appeal for lbw but looked like it came off the glove, goes between the keeper's legs
length outside off, cuts it towards sweeper cover
length ball around off, chips it towards covers for one
length ball outside off, goes for the reverse sweep but no connection this time
length ball around off, looks to go over the bowler's head but ends up slicing it towards cover-point, Haris Sohail runs backwards, tries to be sideways but is never stable and drops the catch
fuller on the stumps, uses his feet to work it towards midwicket
length ball around off, a googly perhaps, beats the forward push
flatter outside off, goes for the cut but ends up chopping it towards cover
skips down the track and slashes it over covers, not from the middle of the bat, only a single
flatter but well outside off, left alone
length outside off, cuts it towards sweeper cover for one
length ball on the stumps, goes for the slog sweep but fails to middle it. Gets more height than the distance and Iftikhar makes no mistake at deep midwicket

length ball down the leg side, goes for the flick but misses. An appeal for caught-behind by Sarfaraz, Aleem Dar says wide but Sarfaraz wants to review it. Replays show it brushed the thigh pad but no bat at all. Pakistan lose their review. But think Aleem Dar will have to change his decision of the wide too. Some confusion here but the common sense prevails in the end and it's deemed a legal delivery
length ball outside off, pushes at it and gets beaten
length ball around off, taps it towards covers for one
fuller on the stumps, following the batsman who was backing away, works it towards wide long-on
length ball angling on the pads, tucked away towards fine leg
fuller but way down the leg side
length ball around off, hits it into the ground and over the bowler, a single to long-off
fuller on the stumps, looks to hit it towards midwicket, gets an inside edge on to the pads
a brilliant yorker on the stumps, jams his bat at it and digs it out towards extra cover, Babar looks to flick it on to the stumps as the non-striker was backing up, misses and concedes an overthrow
fuller outside off, goes for the reverse sweep, gets a bottom edge into the ground and to the keeper
another yorker, full and straight, Gunathilaka was looking to hit towards long-on, misses and the ball clatters into the stumps. Gunathilaka walks back for 133 off 134
a slower one but down the leg side, needs to bowl this again
length ball around off, taps it towards covers for one
another slower one, length around off, drops it towards covers for one more
fuller on the pads, flicks it away but straight towards short fine leg
fuller outside off, almost a yorker, steers it towards point by opening the face of the bat
fuller on the stumps, swipes it towards deep square leg, Iftikhar misfields at the boundary and allows it to go for a boundary, 250 is up for Sri Lanka
fuller on the stumps, pushes towards mid-on for a quick single, a direct hit there but Shanka was well in
length ball around off, taps it towards covers for one
short of length down the leg side, pulled away towards fine leg and Amir lets it go through his legs
fuller on the stumps, clears his front leg and smashes it overs the bowler's head for a six
fuller and wider outside off, lofts it towards deep extra cover
short of length outside off, tennis-ball bounce, dabs it behind point
a low full toss outside off, way too outside off, Shanaka gets some bat on it and the thick outside edge beats the keeper
better, in the blockhole, digs it out towards mid-off
another full toss, this time on the pads, tucked away towards deep midwicket
slower length ball outside off, cuts it to cover-point, Sohail there
a low full toss on the stumps, a bit of reverse swing, pushed towards covers for a quick single
slower length ball, moves across and looks to scoop towards fine leg, misses
another slower one, fuller around off, Shanaka clears his front leg and smashes it over long-off, just clears the boundary
147kph! Short of length down the leg side, goes for the pull but it hurries on to the batsman, dribbles towards short fine leg
short of length once again, mistimes the pull towards square leg
short of length around off, bends his back and ramps it towards third man
a yorker at the stumps, Hasaranga can only dig it out back to the bowler
another yorker, this time following the batsman who was moving away, misses the flick. A leg bye as the ball rolls towards cover
down the track and takes it on the full, but only a single to long-on
fuller outside off, Hasaranga was moving towards the off side, goes for the flick but ends up hitting it on to his stumps. Amir gets his third wicket
length ball around middle and leg, drops it on the leg side and sets off, Amir fields it, turns around and hits the stumps direct to find Shanaka short at the non-striker's end
another yorker, digs it out towards cover for a quick single. A shy at the bowler's end, misses. Think Shanaka was in anyway
a full toss outside off to start with and Shanaka has smashed it over covers, finds the gap in the deep
fuller outside off, clears his front leg and smashes it past mid-off for four more

length ball this time, looks to go aerial down the ground, gets a top edge and Sarfaraz completes a good catch near short third man. But wait, they are checking for a front-foot no-ball, and Wahab has overstepped here. Shanaka survives, free hit coming up as well
a brilliant yorker at the off stump, Pradeep was backing away and misses. But it's a free hit and they get a single as the ball ricochets towards third man. Shinwari does well to stop the boundary
short of length, Shanaka pulls it towards deep square leg
fuller outside off, slashed towards sweeper cover for one
length, wide outside off, Shanaka was backing away and had to reach out for it, ends up mistiming it towards extra and an easy catch for Haris Sohail there
length ball outside off, and angling further away. Left alone
length ball on middle, offering little space to the batsman. Flat-batted back to the bowler
length ball outside off, and punched to cover
full, wide outside off and angling further away. Fakhar throws hsi hands at this, but can't connect
length ball on middle, and Fakhar can only tap this back to the bowler. Starts off with a maiden
full, just outside off stump. Leans forward to mistime a drive to the bowler
full, just outside off stump. Firmly defended to cover
good length on off, and he rides the bounce before pulling along the ground to deep midwicket
length again, this time outside off. Firmly pushed back to the bowler
full, on off, and worked off his toes to the leg side
overpitched just outside off, and he smacks it back to the bowler. Stopped by Shanaka on his followthrough, sticking his left arm outwards
full, on off, and he mistimes a drive straight past the bowler. Mid-off dives to his left, but can't stop the single
length ball, just outside off. Presses forward and fends it back to the bowler
first boundary! Full, just outside off, and he brings his bat down to strike a drive past the bowler for a four
another one! Off his pads this time. Angling in, and whipped past midwicket
length ball, on off, and fended with the full face of the bat
full, just outside off, and he splices the drive to cover
full, on off, and he mistimes a drive to mid-off. Can't pinch the run
searching for the yorker. Full, just outside leg stump, and he misses the whip. Appeal for lbw turned down. Probably pitched outside the stumps
searching for the yorker again, but this time the inswinger is whipped off his toes to deep midwicket
back of a length, angling into him, and pulled over midwicket. Not the best timing, so they need to settle for two
full, just outside off stump. Fended back to the bowler
length ball on his pads, and worked away to deep backward square
length ball, on off, and fended back to the bowler
fuller, and defended back
length ball, just outside off, and he splices a defensive shot back to the bowler
length ball, just outside off, and he punches through the covers. Man chasing the ball parries it back
length ball, on leg stump. Flicked behind square
full and wide outside off. Throws his hands at this, and edges it past the cordon to third man
length ball, just outside off, and flat-batted past the non-striker for four. Gets him going
full, just outside off stump. Mistimes a drive to cover
full, on middle, and pushed to cover. They take a dangerous single - direct hit would've been out. Hasaranga the fielderf
full, on middle. Worked off his toes to deep midwicket
full, on off, and driven straight to mid-on. A feet on either side and that would've been four
beautiful shot! Full, just outside off, and he presses forward to place a drive between mid-off and mid-on
angling into his pads, and he tries to whip one behind square. Finds short fine leg
full toss, on his pads. Muscled away to deep midwicket
full, on middle. He walks across the stumps before placing a whipped shot through midwicket for another four. Glorious wristwork
full, on off, and he guides a whipped shot past backward square leg for one more boundary
back of a length. Outside off stump. Punched off the back foot to cover
good length, outside off, and he opens the bat's face to guide a shot to deep point
length ball, angling into his pads. He rides the bounce and flicks a shot off his hips to the backward square leg fence
angling into his pads again, but this flick has gone to the fielder now positioned at the deep
back of a length, on off, and worked off his waist to square leg
back of a length, just outside off, and punched after riding the bounce. Finds point
back of a length, on middle, and he swivels to hammer a pull. Finds the fielder at deep midwicket though
length ball, outside leg stump, and turning further down the leg side. Flicked to short fine leg
full on middle stump, and pushed towards cover
googly on middle, and pushed towards the leg side
over long on! Extra flight given and punished. Big stride to meet the ball and he follows up with a solid followthrough to send it over the boundary
full ball on the stumps, and pushed away to the leg side once more
angling away from him, and guided to third man
played fine! Pitching outside leg stump, and he uses his wrists to place this very fine
full, just outside off, and he leans into a beautiful looking cover drive
back of a length, on off stump, and he spots the length early. Ducks
back of a length, on off once again. Ducks
full, just outside off, and he prepares to drive, but mistimed towards the off side
length ball zipping through, and he edged a shot towards the leg side
quicker one, zipping into Abid. Forced to go backfoot before blocking it back
extra flight, and he prepares to sweep behind square, but changes his shot last moment. Tapped towards the off side
classy way to reach 50! Short, wide, and he rides the bounce before depositing a boundary to deep point
good length, just outside off, but he mistimes that cut shot on this occasion
full on off, but the turn away from him whizzes past his outside edge as he prepares to drive
overpitched on off, and he mistimes a shot back to the bowler
fullish again, and this time he opens the bat's face to drive towards the fielder positioned at cover
back of a length, and he goes deep into his crease before punching one through the covers
stump to stump from the bowler. Defended back to him
a ripper from Hasaranga. Turns into Fakhar, who splices the shot for a single

dropped! Oh dear. Hasaranga bowled a full toss to Abid, and he hammers a shot behind square by swiping cross batted. Wasn't timed well, and straight to the substitute fielder Sadeera, but he fluffs it in the deep
length ball on off, and turning across Abid. Misses
full, on his toes, and put away by flicking to deep backward square
full, outside leg stump, and put away. Gets down on one knee, and sweeps behind square. Fielder gets to it, but still can't stop the ball from rolling over
full on middle, and tapped back to the bowler
full, outside leg, and he sweeps this hard. Finds the sweeper fielder though
good length, outside off, and he uses the depth of the crease to place a cut-shot behind point for four
full, on middle. Pushed back to Hasaranga
length ball, outside off. Punches with the turn to cover
full, just outside off. Pushes the legbreak towards cover point with the bat's open face
googly turns in sharply as he tries to drive. Inside-edged onto his pad and that's why the umpire says not out for the lbw
full, just outside off, and the attempted drive flies off his outside edge. Man from short third man has to give the ball a mighty chase
full, just outside leg stump. Carefully fended back to Hasaranga
length ball on middle, and the googly is going down the leg side. But he flicks it anyway, to short fine leg
length ball, just outside off. Gets behind the line of the ball and pushes to long on
good length, just outside off, and punched straight back to long off for a walking single
full, on his toes, and flicked towards the leg side
full, on middle. Whipped with the turn towards the square-leg umpire
length ball, from around the wicket. Nudged off his pads to deep midwicket
full, just outside off but turning into his pads. Defended with a big stride forward
full, on leg stump and turning into his pads. A muted lbw appeal since it was going to miss the stumps
full, just outside off stump. Driven towards cover
edged past the keeper Tries to cut this length ball square, but it gets a thick edge. Keeper too slow to reach and Pakistan are just two short of triple digits
full, on off stump, and defended with a big stride forward
swept and swept hard! Full, on middle, turning into his pads, and he gets down on one knee to hammer a boundary. Team hundred
good length on middle, and he uncomfortably slogs towards the leg side
length ball on middle, and blocked with the full face of the bat to mid-on
full, outside leg, and he prepares to sweep. Hits the outside of his pads instead
half-tracker on middle, and he muscles an attempted pull to deep midwicket
flayed! Full, outside off, and he slaps a boundary - with the turn - to enter his forties
good length, on off. Punched down to long on for a single. Drinks
length ball on the stumps, goes back and cuts, straight towards short third man
fuller outside off this time, comes forward and looks to defend, gets an outside edge through the vacant slip area and to the third man boundary
fuller down the leg side, goes for the reverse sweep but misses
length ball around off, punched towards covers from the back foot
a googly, fuller outside off, looks to drive through extra cover, gets an inside edge on to the pads
length ball around off, rocks back and cuts it towards backward point
fuller around off, comes forward and drives it gently towards long-on
length ball on the stumps, comes forward and defends
short of length on the stumps, defended towards short midwicket from the back foot
too full outside off, digs it out towards deep extra cover
fuller on the stumps, comes forward and works it towards short midwicket
length ball outside off, goes back and plays it late, gets three to third man
fuller around off, comes forward and defends
fuller on the stumps, goes for the slog sweep but ends up getting a top edge. Luckily it lands in no-man's land, halfway between the 30-yard circle and deep midwicket

googly, spins back sharply to catch the batsman on the back foot. Abid shapes up to play a cut but fails to get his bat down in time and is struck on the pad. A big appeal for lbw but denied by Joel Wilson. Sri Lanka want to review this. No bat involved and it struck him in the line of the leg stump. Would have gone on to hit the leg stump
a full toss outside off stumps, drives it towards long-off to get off the mark
length ball on middle and spinning in, goes back and punches it towards the bowler
length ball around off, steers it towards point for one
length ball outside off, goes for the cut and misses
fuller around off, comes forward and blocks
fuller and wider outside off, looks to go over extra cover but ends up slicing it over cover instead, gets to his fifty with a single
fuller on the stumps, possibly a wrong'un, nudges it in front of square leg
length ball on the stumps, tucked away towards square leg
fuller on the stumps, turns it towards square leg for another easy single
fuller outside off, drive it through covers for one more
fuller around off, comes forward and pushes it towards square leg
almost chips it back, the ball dips on him, Fakhar pushes at it, gets an inside edge and it ricochets down the pitch of the pad
tossed up around the off stump, comes forward and blocks
length ball on the stumps, sweeps it towards square leg
length ball around off, comes forward and blocks
fuller and spinning away, cuts it towards deep point
fuller around off, comes forward and blocks
fuller again, driven towards long-on from the front foot
length ball on the pads, tucked away towards square leg
length ball around the leg stump, comes forward and looks to work on the leg side, but it's a googly and lobs towards covers
fuller on the stumps, drives firmly but straight towards the bowler
a low full toss on the stumps, flicked away towards deep square leg

fuller on the stumps, skips down and hits it dead straight, was in the air as he couldn't reach to the pitch of the ball but evades the outstretched right hand of Hasaranga. Joel Wilson does well to duck under it
fuller outside off, works it towards extra cover
length ball on the stumps, flicked towards short midwicket
Fakhar cuts loose now. Clears his front leg and hits it with the spin, finds the gap between long-on and deep midwicket
a googly around off, stays back and defends towards cover-point
length outside off, goes back and cuts it towards sweeper cover
length ball around off, punched towards deep extra cover from the back foot
tossed up on the stumps, driven to the right of the bowler who dives across but fails to get a hand on it
fuller outside off, comes forward and drives it towards sweeper cover
a googly from outside off, Fakhar plays it late and beats short third man, the fielder puts in the chase and stops it just inside
short of length outside off, goes back and cuts it towards sweeper cover
short of length outside off, goes for the cut but gets a thick outside edge towards third man
a sharp bouncer, Fakhar goes for the pull but misses. The keeper jumps but can get only his hands to it. And they sneak in two byes
slower length ball outside off, guides it towards third man
another short one but down the leg side and doesn't bounce that much, Babar pulls it down towards fine leg
length ball on the pads, tucked away towards the right of fine leg
length ball around off, dabs it towards third man for one more
length ball on the stumps, skips down and nudges it towards square leg, and they set off for a quick single, Fakhar puts in the dive but a wide throw means they get four overthrows
length ball outside off, goes for the cut but misses
tossed up on the stumps, slower through the air, comes forward and blocks
flighted on the stumps once more. Goes for the slog sweep but ends up dragging towards square leg off the bottom edge
fuller on middle and leg, turns it gently towards fine leg
length ball on the stumps, tucked away in front of square leg
length ball on the stumps, Fakhar was looking to dab it on the off side but the bowler follows him, ends up dropping on the pitch. Was looking for a single but Lahiru was quick to the ball
short of length outside off, looks to cut it through covers but it keeps low and sneaks under the bat. On the bounce to the keeper
short this time but no trouble for Fakhar, pulls it towards deep square leg
fuller around off, in the driving zone and Babar obliges with a glorious extra-cover drive
short of length this time, dabs it down towards third man
length ball around off, punched off the back foot towards sweeper cover, and they come back for the second
length ball around off, punched towards short midwicket from the back foot
short outside off, rocks back and cuts it hard towards deep extra cover, Nuwan Pradeep from deep cover cuts it off
dragged down once again, goes back and pulls it towards deep midwicket
tossed up outside off, digs it out towards deep extra cover
fuller on the pads, flicked towards deep-backward square leg
a googly, pitching around middle and off and spinning in, punched towards short midwicket from the back foot

length ball around off and skids back in to beat the bat and hit Babar on the knee roll, an appeal for lbw but Joel Wilson says on. Sri Lanka take the review, I think just in time. Replays show there was no bat involved and it would have gone on to hit the top of the middle stump
and beaten outside off. Was a length ball in the channel, Sarfaraz pushes at it but gets beaten by the seam movement
length ball on the stumps, tucked towards midwicket to get off the mark
length ball outside off, goes for the pull but misses as it doesn't bounce as much as Fakhar expected
length ball on the stumps, pushes it back towards the bowler
length ball outside off, steers it towards third man
dropped by Gunathilaka at first slip. Fuller outside off, goes for a big booming drive, gets a thick outside edge to the right of Gunathilaka who goes one-handed but it doesn't stick
fuller but way too outside off, Sarfaraz lets it go and collects a wide
fuller outside off, sweeps it towards deep-backward square leg
length ball on the stumps, goes back and turns it towards square leg
fuller outside off, a googly this time, Sarfaraz was looking to work it on the leg side, misses but gets a bye as it bounces just in front of first slip who fails to make a clean stop
length ball around off, punched back towards the bowler
fuller outside off, sweeps it towards deep midwicket
length ball on middle and moving in, looks to flick but misses. The ball drops on the off side after hitting the thigh but the fielder was quick and prevents the single
length ball angling in, stays in his crease and tucks it towards short midwicket
short of length outside off, goes for the upper cut but ends up hitting it towards the third man fielder. Shanaka takes a couple of steps diagonally to his left and takes it without any fuss
length ball outside off, defended from the front foot
length ball around off, stays back and forces it towards short midwicket
length ball on the stumps, pushes it towards mid-on from the back foot
a googly from outside off, spinning back in but Haris does well to keep it out, works it towards covers
fuller outside off, comes forward and drives it towards extra cover
fuller around off, driven straight back but Sandakan dives across to make the stop
fuller on the stumps, flicks it towards midwicket
tossed up around off but too full, mistimes the flick towards backward square leg
another googly, goes back and punches it towards sweeper cover
full, just outside off, and tapped back to the bowler. Pradeep throws it back towards Sarfaraz, and the ball goes into the keeper's gloves
length ball, outside off, and guided with the bat's open face to deep point
length ball, angling in from outside off stump. Tapped with soft hands
full, on middle, and clipped off his pads to deep midwicket
full, on off, and he taps the slower ball away to mid-on
full, on off, and flicked into the gap near deep midwicket. Misfield from Jayasuriya in the deep gives Pakistan two free runs
length ball, outside off and turning further away. Flat-batted to mid-off
another length ball outside off, and cut through to the fielder in the deep. Enough time to jog back for the second run
googly on middle stump, and turning away. Tapped to mid-off off the back foot
length ball, outside off stump. Cut square to the fielder at point
full, just outside off stump. Defended
full outside off, but the googly spins inwards. Defended with soft hands
full pitched on middle stump, and tapped off the back foot to the off side
full, just outside off, and driven to deep extra cover
full, just outside off stump. Driven through to deep point
full, on off stump. Defended towards cover
good length on off. Tries to nudge leg-side, but leading edge takes it towards cover instead
length ball on middle. Turning into his pads. Flicked to deep midwicket
full outside off stump. Drives the legbreak to cover
full, on middle. And he caresses a drive to long on
full, on middle. Pushed back past the bowler to long on
length ball, outside off. Punched with the turn to long off
full, outside leg stump. Turning down the leg side, and flicked square leg
length ball, on middle and going down the leg side. Guided off his pads to fine leg
full outside off, and driven away from his body to deep extra cover
full, on middle, and tapped to midwicket
full, on off, and driven with the straight bat to long on
length ball, outside off and punched to deep point
length ball, outside off, and punched through the covers to wide long off
length ball, outside off. The googly turns inwards, and cuts to point
nearly bowled! Full, outside off and turning into the left hander. Attempts to drive, but playing for the wrong turn. Past his edge
full, on middle, and flicked behind square
full toss, and he swings across the line to deep midwicket
full, just outside off. Guided with the turn to third man
length ball on middle. Punched to long on
length ball on off, and pulled along the ground to deep midwicket
full, on leg stump. Tapped to mid-on
full on middle. Drilled to wide mid-on
back of a length slower ball, outside off, and he tries to ramp it over the keeper. Can't connect
back of a length, just outside off. Rides the bounce to guide it behind square
yorker, on off stump, and he does well to dig it out
length ball, outside off stump and turning into Sarfaraz. Tries to flick square but it hits his pad and rolls away to cover. Lbw appeal turned down. Impact seemed to be outside off stump
length ball, from around the wicket. Lands on off, and punched to long on
full, just outside off. Driven with the turn to long on for a walking single
full, just outside off. Tapped towards cover point
full, on off, and driven with the offbreak to long on
full, just outside off, and he drives with the turn to deep extra cover.
chopped on! Back of a length outside off, and he tries to guide this fine, but has instead played on onto his off stump
length ball, angling into the stumps. Fended off the back foot
full, on middle. Uses his bottom hand to drive awkwardly towards mid-on
back of a length on off. Swivels to confidently pull along the ground. Sweeper fielder cleans up
length ball, outside off, and cut square. Finds point
back of a length on off, and he ducks to get under the delivery
full on middle, and pushed to midwicket for a comfortable single
full, on off stump. Pushed to the left of midwicket off the back foot
full, on leg stump. Swept behind square to the man riding the boundary line
full, just outside off. Skips down the ground and lofts it over cover
length ball, outside off stump. Makes room to cut square. Stopped by point
length ball, on off. Punched to long on
back of a length, from around the wicket. He stands tall and firmly punches it to mid-on
back of a length, outside off again. The punch finds mid-off once again. RRR over 7 now
gold dust! Short ball on middle, and forces Haris to take a knee and get under the ball's line
falls safe! Back of a length on off, and he slices a pull. In the air for ages, but falls before midwicket can run towards mid on
length ball on off. Stays on the back foot and fended back to the bowler
tidy over! Length ball outside off, and he mistimes a cut to point. Just the solitary single all over
full on off stump from around the wicket. Driven with the turn to wide long off
fullish ball outside off and zipping through. iftikhar taps a shot towards midwicket
full, on off, and pushed back towards the non-striker. Jayasuriya runs across to intercept. RRR over 8 now
full, outside off, and he skips down the wicket to meet the ball. Splices a shot to long off
lucky touch! He sees Iftikhar coming down the wicket and bowls full outside leg stump. But it deflected off his pads, past the keeper's left for a streaky boundary
full, outside off, and he opens the bat's face to guide a shot past point. Fielder gives it a chase
back of a length on leg stump. Haris makes room, exposing all three stumps, before flat-batting a muscular shot over wide long off! Much needed
full, on leg stump. Clipped off his boots in front of square. Big chase for the man at deep backward square leg, but he manages to pull the ball back. Avishka the fielder doing the hard yards
full toss, on off. He slices a drive to deep extra cover. Fifty for Haris but reckon the job's far from done
well placed! Slower ball, but short from Kumara. He swivels and places a pulled shot behind square for four! Fine leg not even close
big moves being made! Full, outside off, and he throws his hands at this. Clatters a square drive through the off side
yorker, on off. Driven towards the off side
yorker, on middle. Dug away to the leg side
slower ball, wide outside off, and he mistimes a cut to short third man
full, just outside off. The cover drive rolls away to the sweeper fielder on the off side
attempted yorker outside off, but he sticks his bat down and guides a shot beautifully past backward point for four
full, on middle. Pushed off his toes to long on
nearly a yorker on off. Dug back to Pradeep
full, just outside off. Defended
good length on off, and flicked with the turn to the leg side
is there a twist? Length ball on middle, and turning away from Haris as he makes room to cut. He misses the shot, and the ball clatters into off stump
full, outside off, and he drags a sweep to the leg side. In the air for a while, but drops short of Sandakan at cow corner
length ball, just outside off. Tapped to the gap in front of point for a quick single. He'll keep strike
put away! Waist-high full toss on leg stump, and he uses his wrists to whip a six behind square! Pakistan need just three
Pakistan win the series 2-0! Another full toss on his toes, and flicked behind square to seal victory
